dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2655 IH: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to sunset the Federal income tax on unemployment compensation.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Thanedar (for himself, Mr. Johnson of Georgia, Mrs. Foushee, Ms. Norton, and Ms. Bynum) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to sunset the Federal income tax on unemployment compensation.

section.header: Termination of tax on unemployment compensation

subsection.text: Section 85 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking subsection (c) and inserting the following new subsection:

subsection.header: Termination of inclusion in gross income
subsection.text: This section shall not apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2024.
The amendment made by this section shall apply to amounts received after December 31, 2024, in taxable years ending after such date.
